   <script>
    jQuery('html').find('script[src="Bsmart/BSmartJScripts/JQUERY/jquery.min.js"]').remove();
 	document.write(unescape('%3Cscript type="text/javascript" src="//code.jquery.com/jquery-1.12.4.min.js" integrity="sha256-ZosEbRLbNQzLpnKIkEdrPv7lOy9C27hHQ+Xp8a4MxAQ=" crossorigin="anonymous"%3E%3C/script%3E'));
 	
 	document.write(unescape('%3Clink rel="stylesheet" href="//code.jquery.com/ui/1.12.1/themes/base/jquery-ui.css"%3E%3Clink%3E'))
     document.write(unescape('%3Cscript src="//code.jquery.com/ui/1.12.1/jquery-ui.js"%3E%3C/script%3E'))
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    jQuery(document).ready(function () { 
 		var popUpModalCookie = readCookie('popUpModalCookie')
 		console.log(popUpModalCookie);
 		if (popUpModalCookie != 'true' && editMode == 0) {
 			jQuery('body').mouseleave(function () {
 				var title = 'חופשות, הטבות ומבצעים בדקה ה-90';
 				var modalClass = 'popupModal';
 				var modalBG = 'Media/Uploads/photo.jpg';
 				var content = '<iframe src="abandon_popup.aspx" width="100%" height="250" frameborder="0"></iframe>';
 				showPopUpModal(content, title, modalClass, modalBG);
 				jQuery('body').unbind('mouseleave');
 				jQuery('#myModal.popupModal').on('hidden.bs.modal', function () {
 					createCookie('popUpModalCookie', 'true', '/');
 				});
 			});
 
 		}
 
 	});
 
 	function showPopUpModal(content, title, modalClass, modalBG) {
 		if (modalBG) { jQuery('#myModal .modal-content').css({ 'background': 'url(' + modalBG + ') no-repeat center' }) }
 		if (modalClass) { jQuery('#myModal').addClass('popupModal'); }
 		jQuery('#myModal').find('.modal-title').html(title);
 		jQuery('#myModal').find('.modal-body').html(content);
 		jQuery('#myModal').modal('show');
 	}
 
 
 	///////////////////////////////////cookies/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 	//save cookies open panel
 	function ChangeCookies(type) { createCookie("opentype", type, 1) }
 
 	function createCookie(name, value, days) {
 		var expires;
 		if (days) {
 			var date = new Date();
 			date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
 			expires = "; expires=" + date.toGMTString();
 		} else {
 			expires = "";
 		}
 		document.cookie = escape(name) + "=" + escape(value) + expires + "; path=/";
 	}
 
 	function readCookie(name) {
 		var nameEQ = escape(name) + "=";
 		var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
 		for (var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
 			var c = ca[i];
 			while (c.charAt(0) === ' ') c = c.substring(1, c.length);
 			if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) === 0) return unescape(c.substring(nameEQ.length, c.length));
 		}
 
 		function clearCookie(name) {
 			createCookie(name, "", -1);
 		}
 
 		return "";
 	}
 
 	function eraseCookie(name) { createCookie(name, "", -1); }
 	///////////////////////////////////cookies/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
   </script>
  </head>

 j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
 '//www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
 })(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-TN9F3L');
   </script>

   <script>
    jQuery(document).ready(function () {
 
       var teaserPage = jQuery('body').is('.teaser_page');
       if (teaserPage) {
 
           ga('ec:addImpression', {
               'id': '910341',
               'name': 'צפייה בדף גלובאל בלו',
               'category': 'מהו גלובל בלו',
               'brand': 'גרייבר',
               'position': 1
 
           });
 
           var teaserImg = jQuery('#global_blue_teaser');
           teaserImg.click(function () {
               ga('send', 'event', 'גלובאל בלו', 'click', 'תמונה הוקלקה');
           });
       }
  });
   </script>

             <script type="text/javascript">
              function JustifyMenu() {
         var menu = $find("ctl00_RadMenu1");
         var width = menu.get_element().offsetWidth;
         var singleItemLength = Math.floor(width / menu.get_items().get_count()) - 1 + "px";
         // due to incorrect rounding;     
         // You may need to subtract a larger number depending on     
         // the skin that you are using.      
 
         for (var i = 0; i < menu.get_items().get_count(); i++) {
             var li = menu.get_items().getItem(i).get_element();
             li.style.width = singleItemLength;
         }
     }
             </script>
             <link href="/RadControls/menu/skins/Custom/Menu.Custom.css" rel="Stylesheet" type="text/css"/>

               <li class="rmItem ">
                <a class="rmLink rmRootLink" href="%D7%90%D7%99%D7%A8%D7%95%D7%A4%D7%94_%D7%9C%D7%9E%D7%A9%D7%A4%D7%97%D7%95%D7%AA">
                 <span class="rmText">
                  <h2>
                   אירופה למשפחות
                  </h2>
                 </span>
                </a>
                <div class="rmSlide">
                 <ul class="rmVertical rmGroup rmLevel1">
                  <li class="rmItem rmFirst">
                   <a class="rmLink" href="%D7%97%D7%95%D7%A4%D7%A9%D7%94_%D7%9E%D7%A9%D7%A4%D7%97%D7%AA%D7%99%D7%AA_%D7%91%D7%90%D7%95%D7%A1%D7%98%D7%A8%D7%99%D7%94">
                    <span class="rmText">
                     כפרי נופש ודירות באוסטריה
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </li>
                  <li class="rmItem ">
                   <a class="rmLink" href="%D7%97%D7%95%D7%A4%D7%A9%D7%94-%D7%91%D7%99%D7%A2%D7%A8-%D7%94%D7%A9%D7%97%D7%95%D7%A8-%D7%92%D7%A8%D7%9E%D7%A0%D7%99%D7%94">
                    <span class="rmText">
                     היער השחור
                    </span>
                   </a>
                  </li>

               </li>
               <li class="rmItem ">

                  </li>
                  <li class="rmItem ">

          <div data-panel_nonused_gui="P111" data_gui_componentid="2041" data_gui_containerid="53" data_gui_itemid="0" data_gui_label="תפריט" data_gui_pageid="14" data_gui_paneladmin="0" id="P111" style="display:none;">
          </div>
          <div data-new_design_style="False" data-panel_used_gui="P1111" id="P1111" style="direction:rtl;">
           <style media="screen, projection" type="text/css">
            .padBlock {padding-left:25px;padding-right:25px;}
 				.floating-gallery-pro{float:right;}	
 				.floating-gallery-pro:first-child{padding-right:15px}
 				.floating-gallery-pro:nth-child(2){padding-right:15px;}
 				.floating-gallery-pro:nth-child(3){padding-right:15px;padding-left:15px;}
 				.floating-gallery-pro img{width:297px;height:395px;}				
 				.captionStyle{font-size:24px;font-weight: bold;}
 				.captionStyleSmall{font-size:16px;font-weight: bold;}
 				.picture_list { width: 160px; }
 				.paragraph-big{font-size:2em;top:30%!important;}
 				.paragraph-small{font-size:1.5em;top:35%!important;}
 				.sp-slide img{max-width:951px;}
 				@media (max-width: 767px) {.floating-gallery-pro{float:right;width:33%;padding-left:0.5%!important;}.floating-gallery-pro:last-child{padding-left:0!important;}.floating-gallery-pro img{width:auto;;height:auto;}.sp-slide img{max-width:100%;}.pm3{padding:3px;}.pm3 img{max-width:100%;}.paragraph-big{font-size:13px;line-height:13px;top:37%!important;}.paragraph-small{font-size:11px;line-height:11px;top:60%!important;}}
           </style>
           <script type="text/javascript">
            var topid='47757'
 						
 					function panelDataManagementChild(containerID, itemID, componentID, dateID, difLocation)
 					{	
 						var newWin
 						var url = "BSmartCustomer.aspx?menuid=" + itemID + "&itemid=" + itemID + "&contid=" + containerID + "&compid=" + componentID + "&dateid=" + dateID + "&topmenuid=" + topid
 						if (!difLocation) url="bsmart/BSmartHTMLS/"+url
 						newWin = window.open(url, "", getPopupSettings());
 						newWin.focus();	
 					}
           </script>
           <link href="../design/styles/slider-pro.min.css" media="screen" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
           <link href="../design/styles/jquery.fancybox.css" media="screen" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
           <link href="../design/styles/examples.css" media="screen" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
           <link href="http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:400,600" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
           <script src="../design/jscripts/slider-pro-master/jquery.sliderPro.js" type="text/javascript">
           </script>
           <script src="../design/jscripts/slider-pro-master/jquery.fancybox.js" type="text/javascript">
           </script>
           <script type="text/javascript">
            //limit loop  
 				var sliderCount=1;
 				var limitSliderCount=1;  //-1 without limit
 				var lastSliderAutoplay=true;
 				var lastStartAutoplay='startAutoplay';
 				var isDragging = false;
 				
 				var ContainerSlider='#wowslider-container1'
 
 				jQuery(document).ready(function( $ ) {				
 				{				
 									
 					setTimeout(function(){					
 					jQuery(ContainerSlider).sliderPro({
 						autoplay: lastSliderAutoplay,
 						width: 951, //1400,
 						height: 400,
 						autoHeight: true,
 						fade: false,
 						updateHash: false,
 						endVideoAction: lastStartAutoplay,
 						pauseVideoAction: lastStartAutoplay,
 						
 				
 						 videoEnd: function(event){ // end video return to image
 									var d=jQuery(ContainerSlider).data("sliderPro")
 									var ind=d.getSelectedSlide()
 									jQuery("div.sp-slide[data-index=" + ind + "]").find("iframe").css("display","none");
 									jQuery("div.sp-slide[data-index=" + ind + "]").find("a.sp-video").css("display","block");
 								},
 						
 
 						gotoSlide: function( event ) { //limit loop 
 							var d=jQuery(ContainerSlider).data("sliderPro")
 							var totalCount=d.getTotalSlides()
 							if(!isDragging) sliderCount+=1;
 							//console.log(isDragging + " " +  sliderCount)
 							if (sliderCount >=limitSliderCount*totalCount && limitSliderCount > 0){
 								setTimeout(function(){
 														if(lastSliderAutoplay)	{
 																					jQuery(ContainerSlider)
 																						.sliderPro({
 																									autoplay: false, 
 																									fade: false ,
 																									endVideoAction:'none' ,
 																									pauseVideoAction:'none'});
 																		
 																					lastSliderAutoplay=false;
 																					lastStartAutoplay='none';
 																				}					
 								},1300)							
 							} 
 							isDragging=false;
 						}
 												
 						
 						//shuffle: true
 						//fadeDuration:500
 						//arrows: true
 					});
 					
 					//direction of nav buttons	
 					jQuery(".sp-buttons").css("direction",'ltr')							
 
 					jQuery(ContainerSlider).show();						
 					},100)
 					
 					// instantiate fancybox when a link is clicked
 					
 										
 					//close fancybox
 					$.fancybox.originalClose = $.fancybox.close;
 					$.fancybox.close = function() {
 							//if (sliderCount <= limitSliderCount && limitSliderCount > 0) { 
 								jQuery(ContainerSlider).sliderPro({
 																	autoplay: lastSliderAutoplay, 
 																	fade: false,
 																	endVideoAction:lastStartAutoplay ,
 																	pauseVideoAction:lastStartAutoplay}); 
 								sliderCount+=1;
 							//}				
 							$.fancybox.originalClose();
 					};
 					
 					 
 					
 		
 					
 					
 
 					
 
 
 					//limit loop	
 					jQuery(ContainerSlider).mousedown(function() {
 											isDragging=true;        
 					})
 					}
 				});
           </script>
           <div class="slider-pro" dir="rtl" id="wowslider-container1" style="display:none;">
            <div class="sp-slides" dir="rtl">

         <div class="HomeList">
          <div data-new_design_style="False" data-panel_used_gui="P222" id="P222" style="background-image:url('Media/Uploads/pasTitleYelow.png');background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:top center;direction:rtl;">
           <script>
            function changeImage(id) {
           var mydiv = document.getElementById('img' + id);
           var mytext = document.getElementById('text' + id);
           mydiv.src = 'design/images/arrow_big_over.png';
            mydiv.style.border ='0px'
           mytext.style.fontWeight="bold";
       }
       
       function changeImageout(id) {
           var mydivout = document.getElementById('img' + id);
           mydivout.src = 'design/images/arrow_round.png';
           mydivout.style.border ='0px'
           var mytextout = document.getElementById('text' + id);
           mytextout.style.fontWeight="normal";
       }
           </script>
           <div>
            <div class="main_categoties_home" onmouseout="changeImageout(25224);" onmouseover="changeImage(25224);">
             <div class="title_cat">
              <a class="panel_title3" href="הולנד" id="text25224">
               הולנד למשפחות
              </a>
             </div>
             <div class="arrow_cat">
              <a href="הולנד">
               <img alt="" border="0" id="img25224" src="design/images/arrow_round.png" style="padding:13px 0px;"/>
              </a>
             </div>
             <div class="clear">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div style="width:10px!important;float:right">

      <div class="site_padding" data-new_design_style="False" data-panel_used_gui="P100" id="P100" style="direction:rtl;">
       <div>
        <div class="editor_text" id="BSText31175_100_BSTEXT">
         <h1 style="text-align: center;">
          <span style="font-size: 12pt;">
           כל מה שרציתם לדעת על חופשה משפחתית בכפרי נופש, סנטר פארקס, קלאב מד, קלאב מד סקי, שייט נהרות וטיולי מסורת באירופה
           <br/>
           חופשת סקי בפורים וחופשת סקי בפסח
          </span>
         </h1>
         <table align="center" class="">
          <tbody>
           <tr>
            <td>
             <img alt="" src="/Media/Image/11/BA/spring 2018 HOMEPAGE 2.jpg"/>
             <a href="http://www.graiver.co.il/%D7%A1%D7%A0%D7%98%D7%A8-%D7%A4%D7%90%D7%A8%D7%A7%D7%A1">
              <img alt="" src="/Media/Image/404/CENTER PARKSt.jpg" style=""/>
             </a>
             <a href="http://www.graiver.co.il/%D7%A1%D7%A0%D7%98%D7%A8-%D7%A4%D7%90%D7%A8%D7%A7%D7%A1-%D7%9E%D7%91%D7%A6%D7%A2-%D7%94%D7%A8%D7%A9%D7%9E%D7%94-%D7%9E%D7%95%D7%A7%D7%93%D7%9E%D7%AA">
              <img alt="" src="/Media/Image/%D7%91%D7%90%D7%A0%D7%A8%D7%99%D7%9D/%D7%9B%D7%A8%D7%98%D7%99%D7%A1%D7%99 %D7%A4%D7%A1/spring 2018 HOMEPAGE 2.jpg" style=""/>
             </a>
            </td>
            <td style="text-align: left;">
             <a href="http://www.graiver.co.il/%D7%A7%D7%A8%D7%95%D7%96_breakaway_epic">
              <img alt="" src="/Media/Image/%D7%91%D7%90%D7%A0%D7%A8%D7%99%D7%9D/BREAKAWAYEPIC 11.jpg" style=""/>
             </a>
            </td>
           </tr>
          </tbody>
         </table>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div id="BG6" style="background-image:url('Media/Uploads/bg_pass_middle.png');background-repeat:repeat-y;background-position:top center;; height: 100%; width: 100%">
       <div id="BG4" style="width: 100%; height: 100%; font-size: 0px; background-image:url('Media/Uploads/bg_pass_view.jpg');background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:top center;">
        <div class="partial_site_width">
         <div class="right_side_home">
          <aside>
           <div style="position: relative; top: 20px; z-index: 1200; height: 0px;">

           <!--right content -->
           <div class="HomeContact">
            <div data-new_design_style="False" data-panel_used_gui="P112" id="P112" style="background-image:url('Media/Uploads/contact-bg3(1).jpg');background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:bottom center;direction:rtl;">
             <input aria-labelledby="RedirectPostBack_112" id="RedirectPostBack_112" name="RedirectPostBack_112" style="display:none;" type="submit" value=""/>
             <script language="javascript" src="design/JScripts/form_valid.js" type="text/javascript">
             </script>
             <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
              function initvalidation1()
                     {
 
                     if(!bsmartformvalidation('form1','F100094','#0','0')) {alert('שם מלא: שדה חובה למילוי, לפחות 0 תווים');return false}if(!bsmartformvalidation('form1','F100096','#0','10')) {alert('טלפון: שדה חובה למילוי, לפחות 0 תווים');return false}if(!bsmartformvalidation('form1','F100097','#5','1')) {alert('דוא"ל: שדה חובה למילוי, לפחות 5 תווים');return false}
                     openWindMessage()
                     return true;
                   }
 									
                   function ClickCheckBox(cjeck_obj,fname){
 										if (cjeck_obj.checked){
 										document.getElementById(fname).value="1"
 										} else {
 										document.getElementById(fname).value="0"
 										}
                   }
 
                   function openWindMessage()
                   {
                   window.open('popupAfterContact.aspx','message','height=250,width=280,top=100,left=350,status=yes,resizable=1,toolbar=no,menubar=no,location=no');
                   }
 
 
 
                 jQuery(function(){
                 var keyStop = {
                 //8: ":not(input:text, textarea, input:file, input:password)", // stop backspace = back
                 13: "input:text, input:password", // stop enter = submit
 
                 end: null
                 };
                 $(document).bind("keydown", function(event){
                 var selector = keyStop[event.which];
 
                 if(selector !== undefined && $(event.target).is(selector)) {
                 event.preventDefault(); //stop event
                 }
                 return true;
                 });
                 });
 				
 				function addHierarchy()
 				{
 					jQuery('#F100857').val('דף הבית');				
 				}
             </script>

               <div itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product">
                <div align="right" style="background:url('/design/images/bg_pic_home.png') no-repeat center top;width:123px;float:right;min-height:108px">

                 </div>
                 <div>
                  <a class="normal" href="http://www.graiver.co.il/%D7%9B%D7%A4%D7%A8_%D7%94%D7%A0%D7%95%D7%A4%D7%A9_Bispinger_Heide?bsp=27493" itemprop="description">

             <div class="editor_text" id="BSText13051_27_BSTEXT">
              <table>
               <tbody>
                <tr>
                 <td>
                  <table>
                   <tbody>

              <div mm="1" style="text-align: justify;">
               <strong style="color: red; font-size: medium; text-align: right;">
                <span style="font-size: 16px; color: red;">
                 <strong>
                  <span style="color: red;">
                   <strong>
                    <table class="reLayoutWrapper" id="bsDefaultEditorWrapper" style="width: 100%; height: 482px; min-height: 482px; display: inline !important;">
                     <tbody style="display: inline !important;">
                      <tr style="display: inline !important;">
                       <td class="reContentCell" id="bsDefaultEditorCenter" style="height: 100%; display: inline !important;">
                        <div class="reContentArea reContentAreaToggle" id="bsDefaultEditor_contentDiv" style="min-height: 373px; min-width: 658px; width: 650px; overflow-y: hidden; display: inline !important;">
                         <h3 style="display: inline !important;">
                          רשת קלאב מד מציעה בכל מקום את המועדון הנכון לחופשה משפחתית או זוגית, קלאב מד לחופשה בקיץ , קלאב מד סקי לחופשה בחורף.
                         </h3>
                        </div>
                       </td>
                      </tr>
                     </tbody>
                    </table>
                   </strong>
                  </span>
                 </strong>
                </span>
               </strong>
              </div>
              <strong style="color: red; font-size: medium; text-align: right;">
               <span style="font-size: 16px; color: red;">
                <strong>
                 <span style="color: red;">

                  </strong>
                 </span>
                </strong>
               </span>
              </strong>

                </strong>
               </span>
              </strong>
              <strong style="color: red; font-size: medium; text-align: right;">
               <span style="font-size: 16px; color: red;">

                 <span style="color: red;">

           <div data-new_design_style="False" data-panel_used_gui="P67" id="P67" style="direction:rtl;">
            <style type="text/css">
             .stepcarousel{
         position: relative; /*leave this value alone*/
         border: 0px solid black;
         overflow: scroll; /*leave this value alone*/
         width: 590px; /*Width of Carousel Viewer itself*/
         height: 169px;
         /*Height should enough to fit largest content's height*/
         margin:0px 25px;
         }
 
         .stepcarousel .belt{
         position: absolute; /*leave this value alone*/
         left: 0;
         top: 0;
         }
 
         .stepcarousel .panel{
         float: left; /*leave this value alone*/
         overflow: hidden; /*clip content that go outside dimensions of holding panel DIV*/
         margin: 10px 5px 10px 5px; /*margin around each panel*/
         width: 190px; /*Width of each panel holding each content. If removed, widths should be individually defined on each content DIV then. */
         }
         .titleImgJQ{font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 9pt;line-height: 120%; text-decoration: none; letter-spacing: normal; color: #555;padding:3px;}
            </style>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             $=jQuery.noConflict()
 
         stepcarousel.setup({
         galleryid: 'mygallery', //id of carousel DIV
         beltclass: 'belt', //class of inner "belt" DIV containing all the panel DIVs
         panelclass: 'panel', //class of panel DIVs each holding content
         autostep: {enable:true, moveby:1, pause:3000},
         panelbehavior: {speed:500, wraparound:false, wrapbehavior:'slide', persist:true},
         defaultbuttons: {enable: true, moveby: 1, leftnav: ['design/images/arrow_left.png', 0, 60], rightnav: ['design/images/arrow_right.png',0, 60]},
         statusvars: ['statusA', 'statusB', 'statusC'], //register 3 variables that contain current panel (start), current panel (last), and total panels
         contenttype: ['inline'] //content setting ['inline'] or ['ajax', 'path_to_external_file']
         })
            </script>
            <img alt="" src="design/images/pass_gray_center.jpg" vspace="7"/>

             </div>
            </div>

                       <td align="left" valign="bottom">
                        <a href="כותבים-מספרים" target="_blank">
                         <img alt="" border="0" hspace="0" src="design/images/details_blue.png"/>
                        </a>
                       </td>
                      </tr>
                     </table>
                    </td>
                   </tr>
                  </table>
                 </td>
                </tr>
               </table>
              </td>
             </tr>
            </table>
           </div>
          </article>
         </div>
         <div class="left_side" style="float: right;">

   <script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
   	window._pa = window._pa || {};
 		/*
      _pa.orderId = "myOrderId"; // OPTIONAL: attach unique conversion identifier to conversions
      _pa.revenue = "19.99"; // OPTIONAL: attach dynamic purchase values to conversions
      _pa.productId = "myProductId"; // OPTIONAL: Include product ID for use with dynamic ads
 		*/

   })();
